programlisting: # Creates a user. # # @param user_name [String] The name to give the user. # @return [Aws::IAM::User] The newly created user. def create_user(user_name) user = @iam_resource.create_user(user_name: user_name) puts("Created demo user named #{user.name}.") rescue Aws::Errors::ServiceError => e puts("Tried and failed to create demo user.") puts("\t#{e.code}: #{e.message}") puts("\nCan't continue the demo without a user!") raise else user end
